comment.author: 48120898@N04
comment._content: This is the Oosterlingenplein rather then the Place Memling (nowadays called Woensdagmarkt).

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/denflater] Thank you so much for giving us the correct location! Berit Wallenberg was probably walking towards the nearby Woensdagmarkt (former Place Memling) when she took this photo, so she named it with that square in her mind. With your help, the information in our photo database as well as here on Flickr Commons is now correct. Streetview on Google Maps: goo.gl/maps/zDtTE /Anna B.
